Report Exporter¶

class exporters.report.report_exporter.ActivityReportExporter(config, db_name, log_root_path)[source]¶

This class handles the generation of reports

export(file_path, json_path)[source]¶

exports the Gitana data to a report

Parameters:
  • file_path (str) – the path where to export the report
  • json_path (str) – the path of the JSON that drives the export process
class exporters.report.chart_generator.ChartGenerator(cnx, logger)[source]¶

This class handles the generation of charts

create(query, x_label, y_label, time_dimension)[source]¶

creates the charts

Parameters:
  • query (str) – SQL query
  • x_label (str) – name of the x label
  • y_label (str) – name of the y label
  • time_dimension (str) – time dimension (week, month, year)
class exporters.report.html_generator.HtmlGenerator(logger)[source]¶

This class handles the generation of an HTML page embedding charts

create(project_name, activity2charts)[source]¶

creates the HTML page

Parameters:
  • project_name (str) – name of the project
  • activity2charts (dict) – map of the activities and corresponding charts
